SystemSetting.enableRegister: Allow new user registration (if set to 'No', new users will not be able to register in any way)

SystemSetting.smtpFromPlaceholder: Usually the same as the email address

EditChannel.organizationOptional: Organization, optional, leave blank for default organization
EditChannel.defaultTestModelPlaceholder: Leave blank for the first model in the list
EditChannel.autoBan: Auto-disable (only effective when auto-disable is enabled), disable to prevent the channel from being automatically disabled:
EditChannel.proxyPlaceholder: This is optional, used to make API calls through a proxy site
EditChannel.privateDeploymentAddressPlaceholder: Enter private deployment address, format: https://fastgpt.run/api/openapi
EditChannel.statusCodeRewrite: Status Code Rewrite (only affects local judgment, does not modify the status code returned to the upstream):
EditChannel.statusCodeRewritePlaceholder: This is optional, used to rewrite the returned status code, such as rewriting the 400 error of the Claude channel to 500 (for retry), do not abuse this function, e.g.:
